DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Ventilatory Asymmetry Chest Wall During Breath Stacking Volume-oriented Incentive Spirometer
DOC.detailed_description: All volunteer undergo two type pulmonary expansion therapy ( PET ) technique : volume incentive spirometry ( VIS ) BS . Procedures involve two distinct phase : assessment intervention . In first day perform assessment participant obtain follow data : anamnesis , initial evaluation use Ashwouth Scale , Barthel Index Mini Mental State Examination , anthropometric data pulmonary function use spirometry respiratory muscle pressure . Intervention phase perform two different day , day one PET technique ( VIS BS ) , minimal wash-out period one day accord randomization sequence . Optoelectronic Pletysmography ( OEP ) record quite breathe rest execution five maneuver form PET technique test .
